full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RTZA RGYUD LE'U BCU BDUN GYI SO SO DANG SPYI'I DON 'GREL PA'I BSHAD RGYUD RGYUD PHYI MA GSANG BA THAMS CAD STON PA'I 'GREL PA GSANG BA'I SGRON MA ZHES BYA BA'I DON ZHIB TU BSHAD PA'I RNAM BSHAD SKAL BZANG MIG 'BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @116A *, ,DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RTZA RGYUD LE'U BCU BDUN GYI SO SO DANG SPYI'I DON 'GREL PA'I BSHAD RGYUD, RGYUD PHYI MA GSANG BA THAMS CAD STON @116B PA'I 'GREL PA GSANG BA'I SGRON MA ZHES BYA BA'I DON ZHIB TU BSHAD PA'I RNAM BSHAD SKAL BZANG MIG 'BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RNAL 'BYOR PA GRU DPAL LDAN BZANG POS DBEN GNAS DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG NAS 'GO BRTZAMS TE, 'BRING MTSAMS GANGS DKAR PO'I PHYOGS SU CHU MO LUG LO, ,BRUM ZLA BA'I DKAR PHYOGS TSES BCU BZHI'I NYIN RDZOGS PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DON GRUB PO, ,'DIS KYANG MDO SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS KUN TU RGYAS PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,` AOm SVA STI, RGYUD RGYAL STON MDZAD KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG, ,RGYUD DON MNGON GYUR PAn CHEN N'A RO PA, ,RGYUD GZHUNG GSAL MDZAD DPAL LDAN BZANG PO'I ZHABS, ,RGYUD SDE RNAM BZHI'I LHA SRUNG BCAS PAS SKYONGS, ,GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RGYUD SDE RGYA MTSO CHE, ,LEGS SRUBS LAS 'KHRUNGS TZINTA MA nI 'DI, ,BGRANG YAS 'GRO LA CHOS SBYIN CHAR 'BEBS SKAD, ,RNAM DGA DPAL GYI DHVA DZA'I RTZER BKOD DO, ,@117A *, ,'DI BZHENGS RNAM DKAR NYIN BYED 'OD ZER GYIS, ,MDO SNGAGS BSHAD SGRUB PHYOGS MTHAR RAB RGYAS SHING, ,BSTAN 'DZIN ZHABS PAD RDO RJE'I KHAMS LTAR BRTAN, ,'GRO BA'I PHAN BDE'I SKYED TSAL 'PHEL 'GYUR CIG , ,,KHYAD PAR 'BREL THOGS GTZO BYAS LUS CAN KUN, ,TSE RABS 'PHRENG BAR MTSAN LDAN BSHES DAD 'JAL, ,THOS BSAM SGROM PA'I GRU ZINGS NYER BSTEN NAS, ,ZUNG 'JUG RIN CHEN GLING DU MYUR PHYIN SHOG ,GSANG CHEN BLA MED 'DUS PA'I RIM GNYIS LAM, ,TSUL BZHIN SGRUB LA NYER 'TSE MI 'BYUNG ZHING, ,LAS GSHIN LA SOGS BSTAN SKYONG RGYA MTSOS KYANG, ,GA-YEL BA MED PAR RTAG TU GROGS BYED SHOG , ,,('DI NI KHU RE CHEN MO'I RGYUD GRVA TSANG GI GRVA BA RNAMS KYIS RGYU YON SBYOR TE PAR DU LEGS PAR BSGRUB PA'O,, ,,)
